title: Rose and Rotshade
description: The monsters we face at war are nothing to the ones awaiting us at the palace…Oh come off it. You’ve read the other three books. Why is Marie making me write this?You know I’m pissed.You know I’m running out of time.Go bloody read it.Yours truly.The Witcher meets Zodiac Academy in a four book romance. Broody vampires. Enemies to lovers. Monsters and magic. Check. Check. Check. All the good stuff. Go buy it.Author’s Note: This is book features explicit sex and is an adult paranormal romance. It contains dark themes, adult language, intimidation, violence, and triggering situations. For mature readers.World features: Vampire, fae, demons, witches wolf and dragon shiftersThis series is ménage (MFM)
author: Marie Mackay
